CustomField.formula:
IF( !ISBLANK(WO_Member_Phone_Number__c),
IF(LEN(WO_Member_Phone_Number__c) = 10,"(" & LEFT(WO_Member_Phone_Number__c, 3) & ") " & LEFT(RIGHT(WO_Member_Phone_Number__c, 7), 3) & "-" & RIGHT(WO_Member_Phone_Number__c, 4),WO_Member_Phone_Number__c),
IF(LEN(Contact.Phone) = 10,"(" & LEFT(Contact.Phone, 3) & ") " & LEFT(RIGHT(Contact.Phone, 7), 3) & "-" & RIGHT(Contact.Phone, 4),Contact.Phone) )
CustomField.label: Phone Number
